snippet.title: Sol-Rui -after mini- - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Rui can't catch a break... She had only just returned to her world after saving Roots, thanks to the power of Sol, but now monsters are attacking her town and kidnapping people! However, the challenge awaiting her is very different this time. It's all smoke, mirrors and illusions...

Sol-Rui -after mini- on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/sol-rui-after-mini/

Sol-Rui -after mini- on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3226850/SolRui_after_mini/
